00014 #ifndef nmrspectrumbaseH
00015 #define nmrspectrumbaseH
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #include <secondarydriver.h>
00018 #include <xnodeconnector.h>
00019 #include <complex>
00020 #include "nmrspectrumsolver.h"
00021 
00022 class XNMRPulseAnalyzer;
00023 class XWaveNGraph;
00024 class XXYPlot;
00025 
00026 template <class FRM>
00027 class XNMRSpectrumBase : public XSecondaryDriver
00028 {
00029     XNODE_OBJECT
00030 protected:
00031     XNMRSpectrumBase(const char *name, bool runtime,
00032                  const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00033                  const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00034                  const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00035                  const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00036 public:
00037     //! ususally nothing to do
00038     virtual ~XNMRSpectrumBase();
00039   
00040     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00041     virtual void showForms();
00042 protected:
00043 
00044     //! this is called when connected driver emit a signal
00045     //! unless dependency is broken
00046     //! all connected drivers are readLocked
00047     virtual void analyze(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) throw (XRecordError&);
00048     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00049     //! record is readLocked
00050     virtual void visualize();
00051     //! check connected drivers have valid time
00052     //! \return true if dependency is resolved
00053     virtual bool checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const;
00054 public:
00055     //! driver specific part below 
00056     const shared_ptr<XItemNode<XDriverList, XNMRPulseAnalyzer> > &pulse() const {return m_pulse;}
00057 
00058     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &bandWidth() const {return m_bandWidth;}
00059     //! Tune bandwidth to 50%/100%/200%.
00060     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &bwList() const {return m_bwList;}
00061     //! Deduce phase from data
00062     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &autoPhase() const {return m_autoPhase;}
00063     //! (Deduced) phase of echoes [deg.]
00064     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &phase() const {return m_phase;}
00065     //! Spectrum solvers.
00066     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &solverList() const {return m_solverList;}
00067     /// FFT Window Function
00068     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &windowFunc() const {return m_windowFunc;}
00069     //! Changing width of time-domain image [%]
00070     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &windowWidth() const {return m_windowWidth;}
00071     
00072     //! records below.
00073     const std::deque<std::complex<double> > &wave() const {return m_wave;}
00074     //! averaged weights
00075     const std::deque<double> &weights() const {return m_weights;}
00076     //! power spectrum density of dark. [V].
00077     const std::deque<double> &darkPSD() const {return m_darkPSD;}
00078     //! resolution [Hz]
00079     double resRecorded() const {return m_resRecorded;}
00080     //! value of the first point [Hz]
00081     double minRecorded() const {return m_minRecorded;}
00082 protected:
00083     //! Records
00084     enum {ACCUM_BANKS = 3};
00085     std::deque<double> m_accum_weights[ACCUM_BANKS];
00086     std::deque<std::complex<double> > m_accum[ACCUM_BANKS];
00087     std::deque<double> m_accum_dark[ACCUM_BANKS]; //[V^2/Hz].
00088 
00089     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnClear, m_lsnOnCondChanged;
00090     
00091     //! \return true to be cleared.
00092     virtual bool onCondChangedImpl(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) const = 0;
00093     //! [Hz]
00094     virtual double getFreqResHint() const = 0;
00095     //! [Hz]
00096     virtual double getMinFreq() const = 0;
00097     //! [Hz]
00098     virtual double getMaxFreq() const = 0;
00099     //! [Hz]
00100     virtual double getCurrentCenterFreq() const = 0;
00101     virtual void afterFSSum() {}
00102     virtual void getValues(std::vector<double> &values) const = 0;
00103     virtual bool checkDependencyImpl(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const = 0;
00104 private:
00105     //! Fourier Step Summation.
00106     void fssum();
00107 
00108     //! Records
00109     std::deque<std::complex<double> > m_wave;
00110     std::deque<double> m_weights;
00111     std::deque<double> m_darkPSD;
00112 
00113     const shared_ptr<XItemNode<XDriverList, XNMRPulseAnalyzer> > m_pulse;
00114  
00115     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_bandWidth;
00116     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_bwList;
00117     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> m_autoPhase;
00118     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_phase;
00119     const shared_ptr<XNode> m_clear;
00120     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_solverList;
00121     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_windowFunc;
00122     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_windowWidth;
00123     
00124     double m_resRecorded, m_minRecorded;
00125   
00126     xqcon_ptr m_conBandWidth, m_conBWList;
00127     xqcon_ptr m_conPulse;
00128     xqcon_ptr m_conPhase, m_conAutoPhase;
00129     xqcon_ptr m_conClear, m_conSolverList, m_conWindowWidth, m_conWindowFunc;
00130 
00131     shared_ptr<FFT> m_ift, m_preFFT;
00132     shared_ptr<SpectrumSolverWrapper> m_solver;
00133     shared_ptr<XXYPlot> m_peakPlot;
00134     std::vector<std::pair<double, double> > m_peaks;
00135 
00136     void analyzeIFT();
00137     
00138     void onCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00139 
00140     XTime m_timeClearRequested;
00141 protected:
00142     const qshared_ptr<FRM> m_form;
00143     const shared_ptr<XStatusPrinter> m_statusPrinter;
00144     const shared_ptr<XWaveNGraph> m_spectrum;
00145     void onClear(const shared_ptr<XNode> &);
00146 };
00147 
00148 #endif
